name: shaadi-mantra
description: Shaadi Mantra - Full Stack Matrimonial Application

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf .next out frontend/.next frontend/out backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.capacitor:build: npm run build:mobile && npm run capacitor:sync
scripts.android:dev: cd frontend && npx cap run android
scripts.android:build: npm run capacitor:build && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug

author: Shaadi Mantra Team
